ai-pp2.3:1.1_0: And what, mendicants, is a hopeless person?
ai-pp2.3:1.2_0: It’s when some person is unethical, of bad qualities, filthy, with suspicious behavior, underhand, no true ascetic or spiritual practitioner—though claiming to be one—rotten inside, corrupt, and depraved.
ai-pp2.3:1.4_0: “They say that the mendicant named so-and-so has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:1.6_0: “Oh, when will I too realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with my own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:1.7_0: This is called a hollow person.
ai-pp2.3:2.1_0: And what, is a hopeful person?
ai-pp2.3:2.2_0: It’s someone who is ethical, of good character.
ai-pp2.3:2.4_0: “They say that the mendicant named so-and-so has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:2.6_0: “Oh, when will I too realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with my own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:2.7_0: This is called a hopeful person.
ai-pp2.3:3.1_0: And what person has done away with hope?
ai-pp2.3:3.2_0: It’s someone who realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.3:3.4_0: “They say that the mendicant named so-and-so has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:3.6_0: “Oh, when will I too realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with my own insight due to the ending of defilements.”
ai-pp2.3:3.8_0: For he is freed, no longer indeed, at least idea.
ai-pp2.3:3.9_0: This is called a person who has done away with hope.
ai-pp2.3:4.1_0: Herein, what are the three people like a sick person?
ai-pp2.3:4.3_0: In some cases a patient will recover from an illness, regardless of whether or not they get suitable food and medicines, and a capable carer.
ai-pp2.3:5.1_0: In some cases a patient will recover from an illness, regardless of whether or not they get suitable food and medicines, and a capable carer.
ai-pp2.3:6.1_0: Take the case of a patient will recover from an illness, but only if they get suitable food and medicines, and a capable carer, and not if they don’t get these things.
ai-pp2.3:7.1_0: Now, it’s for the sake of the last patient—who will recover only if they get suitable food and medicines, and a capable carer—that food, medicines, and a carer are prescribed.
ai-pp2.3:7.2_0: But also for the sake of this patient, the other patients should be looked after.
ai-pp2.3:8.1_0: In the same way, these three people similar to patients are found in the world.
ai-pp2.3:8.3_0: Some people do enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, regardless of whether or not they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims.
ai-pp2.3:9.1_0: But it’s when a person gets to see a Realized One or to go to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims.
ai-pp2.3:10.1_0: Take a person who can enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, but only if they get to see a Realized One, and to hear the teaching and training that he proclaims, and not when they don’t get those things.
ai-pp2.3:11.1_0: Now, it’s for the sake of this last person that teaching the Dhamma is prescribed, that is, the one who can enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, but only if they get to see a Realized One, and to teach the Dhamma.
ai-pp2.3:11.2_0: These are the three people similar to patients found in the world.
ai-pp2.3:12.1_0: And what person is a personal witness?
ai-pp2.3:12.2_0: It’s someone who has direct meditative experience of the eight liberations. And, having seen with wisdom, some of their defilements have come to an end.
ai-pp2.3:12.3_0: This is called a personal witness.
ai-pp2.3:13.1_0: And what person is attained to view?
ai-pp2.3:13.2_0: It’s when someone truly understands: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ...
ai-pp2.3:13.3_0: this person is said to have attained to view.
ai-pp2.3:14.1_0: And what person is freed by faith?
ai-pp2.3:14.2_0: It’s someone who truly understands about suffering ...
ai-pp2.3:14.3_0: They have seen clearly with wisdom the phenomena that are felt. And, having seen with wisdom, some of their defilements have come to an end.
ai-pp2.3:14.4_0: This person is called freed by faith.
ai-pp2.3:15.1_0: And who has speech like dung?
ai-pp2.3:15.2_0: It may happen that a person is summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-pp2.3:15.4_0: Not knowing he says, “I’ll know it.”
ai-pp2.3:15.6_0: Not seeing he says, “I’ll see anyone.”
ai-pp2.3:15.8_0: So they tell a deliberate for the sake of themselves or others.
ai-pp2.3:15.9_0: This is called a person with speech like dung.
ai-pp2.3:16.1_0: And who has speech like flowers?
ai-pp2.3:16.2_0: It’s when a person gives up lying. They’re summoned to a council, an assembly, a family meeting, a guild, or to the royal court, and asked to bear witness:
ai-pp2.3:16.4_0: Not knowing he says, “I don’t know.”
ai-pp2.3:16.7_0: or he says, “I’ll see a betroth.”
ai-pp2.3:16.8_0: So they don’t tell a deliberate lie for the sake of themselves or others.
ai-pp2.3:16.9_0: This is called a person with speech like flowers.
ai-pp2.3:17.1_0: And who has speech like honey?
ai-pp2.3:17.2_0: It’s when someone speaks in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable and agreeable to the people.
ai-pp2.3:17.3_0: This is called a person with speech like honey.
ai-pp2.3:18.1_0: And who is a person with a mind like an open sore?
ai-pp2.3:18.2_0: It may happen that a person is irritable and bad-tempered. They display annoyance, hate, and bitterness.
ai-pp2.3:18.3_0: They’re like a festering sore, which, when you hit it with a stick or a stone, discharges even more.
ai-pp2.3:18.4_0: In the same way, someone is irritable and bad-tempered. When someone is spoken to, they lose their temper ...
ai-pp2.3:18.5_0: This is called a person with a mind like an open sore.
ai-pp2.3:19.1_0: And who has a mind like lightning?
ai-pp2.3:19.2_0: It’s someone who truly understands about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp2.3:19.3_0: They’re like a person with keen eyes in the dark of the night, who sees by a flash of lightning.
ai-pp2.3:19.4_0: In the same way, someone truly understands about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp2.3:19.5_0: This is called a person with a mind like lightning.
ai-pp2.3:20.1_0: And what person has a mind like diamond?
ai-pp2.3:20.2_0: It’s someone who realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.3:20.3_0: It’s like a diamond, which can’t be cut by anything at all, not even a gem or a stone.
ai-pp2.3:20.4_0: In the same way, someone realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.3:20.5_0: This is called a person with a mind like diamond.
ai-pp2.3:21.1_0: And who is the person blind,
ai-pp2.3:21.2_0: Take someone who doesn’t have the kind of vision that’s needed to acquire more wealth or to increase the wealth they’ve already acquired.
ai-pp2.3:21.3_0: And they don’t have the kind of vision that’s needed to know the difference between qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
ai-pp2.3:21.4_0: This is called a person who is corrupt.
ai-pp2.3:22.1_0: And who is the one-eyed person?
ai-pp2.3:22.2_0: Take someone who has the kind of vision that’s needed to acquire more wealth and to increase the wealth they’ve already acquired.
ai-pp2.3:22.3_0: And they don’t have the kind of vision that’s needed to know the difference between qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
ai-pp2.3:22.4_0: This is called a person with vision of the eye.
ai-pp2.3:23.1_0: Who is the person with two eyes?
ai-pp2.3:23.2_0: Take someone who has the kind of vision that’s needed to acquire more wealth and to increase the wealth they’ve already acquired.
ai-pp2.3:23.3_0: And they have the kind of vision that’s needed to know the difference between qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
ai-pp2.3:23.4_0: This is called a person with vision.
ai-pp2.3:24.1_0: And who is the person with upside-down wisdom?
ai-pp2.3:24.2_0: It’s someone who often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:24.3_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:24.4_0: But even while sitting there, that person doesn’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:24.5_0: And when they get up from their seat, they don’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:24.6_0: It’s like when a pot full of water is set straight, so the water stays and doesn’t drain out.
ai-pp2.3:24.7_0: In the same way, someone often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:24.8_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:24.9_0: But even while sitting there, that person doesn’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:24.10_0: And when they get up from their seat, they don’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:24.11_0: This is called a person with upside-down wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:25.1_0: And who is the person with wisdom on their lap?
ai-pp2.3:25.2_0: It’s someone who often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:25.3_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:25.4_0: While sitting there, that person pays attention to the discussion in the beginning, middle, and end.
ai-pp2.3:25.5_0: But when they get up from their seat, they don’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:25.6_0: It’s like when a man’s coins on a charnel ground.
ai-pp2.3:25.7_0: such as sesame, rice, sweets, or jujube—
ai-pp2.3:25.8_0: so that if they get up from the seat without mindfulness, everything gets scattered.
ai-pp2.3:25.9_0: In the same way, someone often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:25.10_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:25.11_0: While sitting there, that person pays attention to the discussion in the beginning, middle, and end.
ai-pp2.3:25.12_0: But when they get up from their seat, they don’t pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:25.13_0: This is called a person with wisdom on their lap.
ai-pp2.3:26.1_0: And who is the person with wide wisdom?
ai-pp2.3:26.2_0: It’s someone who often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:26.3_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:26.4_0: While sitting there, that person pays attention to the discussion in the beginning, middle, and end.
ai-pp2.3:26.5_0: And when they get up from their seat, they continue to pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:26.6_0: It’s like when a pot full of water is set straight, so the water stays and doesn’t drain out.
ai-pp2.3:26.7_0: In the same way, someone often goes to the monastery to hear the teaching in the presence of the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:26.8_0: The mendicants teach them Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And they reveal a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.3:26.9_0: While sitting there, that person pays attention to the discussion in the beginning, middle, and end.
ai-pp2.3:26.10_0: And when they get up from their seat, they continue to pay attention to the beginning, middle, or end of the discussion.
ai-pp2.3:26.11_0: This is called a person who is wise.
ai-pp2.3:27.1_0: And who is a person without greed for sensual pleasures?
ai-pp2.3:27.3_0: These are called the people who are not free from passion and have not free of greed.
ai-pp2.3:28.1_0: And who is a person free of greed for sensual pleasures?
ai-pp2.3:28.3_0: This is called a person who isn’t free of greed.
ai-pp2.3:29.1_0: And who is the person free of greed for sensual pleasures?
ai-pp2.3:29.3_0: This is called a person free of greed and hate.
ai-pp2.3:30.1_0: And who is the person like a line drawn in stone?
ai-pp2.3:30.2_0: It’s when a person is often angry,
ai-pp2.3:30.3_0: and their anger lingers for a long time.
ai-pp2.3:30.4_0: It’s like a line drawn in stone, which isn’t quickly worn away by wind and water, and doesn’t last long.
ai-pp2.3:30.5_0: so it is for a person who is often angry,
ai-pp2.3:30.6_0: but their anger lingers for a long time.
ai-pp2.3:30.7_0: This is called a person like a line drawn in stone.
ai-pp2.3:31.1_0: And who is the person like a line drawn in sand?
ai-pp2.3:31.2_0: It’s when a person is often angry,
ai-pp2.3:31.3_0: and their anger doesn’t linger long.
ai-pp2.3:31.4_0: It’s like a line drawn in sand, which is quickly worn away by wind and water, and doesn’t last long.
ai-pp2.3:31.5_0: so it is for a person who is often angry,
ai-pp2.3:31.6_0: but their anger doesn’t last long.
ai-pp2.3:31.7_0: This is called a person like a line drawn in sand.
ai-pp2.3:32.1_0: And who is the person like a line drawn in water?
ai-pp2.3:32.2_0: It’s someone who, though spoken to by someone in a rough, harsh, and disagreeable manner, still stays in touch, interacts with, and greets them.
ai-pp2.3:32.3_0: It’s like a line drawn in water which isn’t quickly worn away.
ai-pp2.3:32.4_0: In the same way, take a person who, though spoken to by someone in a rough, harsh, and disagreeable manner, still stays in touch, interacts with, and greets them.
ai-pp2.3:32.5_0: This is called a person like a line drawn in sand.
ai-pp2.3:33.1_0: Herein, what are the three people like a jute canvas?
ai-pp2.3:33.3_0: They’re not ugly, unpleasant to touch, and worthless whether it’s new, or worn in, or worn out. They are ugly, unpleasant to touch, disliked, or worn.
ai-pp2.3:33.4_0: They throw it away in a jute robe, or they throw it out.
ai-pp2.3:33.5_0: In the same way, these three people similar to jute robes are found among the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:33.7_0: If a junior monk is unethical, of bad character, this is ugly,
ai-pp2.3:33.8_0: That person is like a jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:33.9_0: If you associate with, accompany, and attend to that person, following their example, it’ll be for your lasting harm and suffering. ...
ai-pp2.3:33.10_0: This is how the unpleasant to touch.
ai-pp2.3:33.11_0: That person is just as unpleasant to touch as jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:33.12_0: Any robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that they receive are not very fruitful or beneficial for the donor.
ai-pp2.3:33.13_0: This is the valuable oppressiveness of littleness.
ai-pp2.3:33.14_0: That person is like a jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:34.1_0: If a middle mendicant is unethical, of bad character, this is how they’re ugly, I say. ...
ai-pp2.3:34.2_0: If a senior mendicant is unethical, of bad character, this is how they’re ugly,
ai-pp2.3:34.3_0: That person is like a jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:34.4_0: If you associate with, accompany, and attend to that person, following their example, it’ll be for your lasting harm and suffering. ...
ai-pp2.3:34.5_0: This is how the unpleasant to touch.
ai-pp2.3:34.6_0: That person is just as unpleasant to touch as jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:34.7_0: Any robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that they receive are not very fruitful or beneficial for the donor.
ai-pp2.3:34.8_0: This is the valuable oppressiveness of littleness.
ai-pp2.3:34.9_0: That person is like a jute canvas.
ai-pp2.3:35.1_0: If such a senior mendicant speaks among the Saṅgha,
ai-pp2.3:35.3_0: “What’s an incompetent fool like you got to say? If you see him, you’re going to death?”
ai-pp2.3:35.4_0: They upset arrangement by speech, just as the Saṅgha makes him unfaithful. They make a voice against him:
ai-pp2.3:35.5_0: These three people similar to jute can are found among the monks.
ai-pp2.3:36.1_0: Herein, what are the three people like a person?
ai-pp2.3:36.3_0: Cloth is beautiful, pleasant to touch, and valuable whether it’s new, worn in, or worn out.
ai-pp2.3:36.4_0: And they store it up in the scented floor covered with the color of coins, as well as the rainy season.
ai-pp2.3:37.1_0: In the same way, these three people similar to sensual pleasures are found among the mendicants.
ai-pp2.3:37.3_0: Take the case of a junior mendicant who is ethical, of good character, this is how they say.
ai-pp2.3:37.4_0: That person is just as beautiful as ugly as praiseworthy.
ai-pp2.3:37.5_0: If you associate with, accompany, and attend to such a person, following their example, it will be for your lasting welfare and happiness.
ai-pp2.3:37.6_0: This is how the pleasant state of happiness.
ai-pp2.3:37.7_0: That person is just as pleasant to touch as pleasure.
ai-pp2.3:37.8_0: Any robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that they receive are very fruitful and beneficial for the donor.
ai-pp2.3:37.9_0: This is the expansive field of greatness.
ai-pp2.3:37.10_0: That person is like a huge big crow.
ai-pp2.3:38.2_0: If a senior mendicant is ethical, of good character, this is how they found.
ai-pp2.3:38.3_0: That person is just as beautiful as ugly as praiseworthy.
ai-pp2.3:38.4_0: If you associate with, accompany, and attend to such a person, following their example, it will be for your lasting welfare and happiness.
ai-pp2.3:38.5_0: This is how the pleasant state of happiness.
ai-pp2.3:38.6_0: That person is just as pleasant to touch as pleasure.
ai-pp2.3:38.7_0: Any robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick that they receive are very fruitful and beneficial for the donor.
ai-pp2.3:38.8_0: This is the expansive field of greatness.
ai-pp2.3:38.9_0: That person is like a huge big crow.
ai-pp2.3:39.2_0: “Venerables, be quiet! The senior mendicant is speaking on the teaching and training.”
ai-pp2.3:39.3_0: If that statement goes to the King’s feet, it would be just be appropriate for them to do the same.
ai-pp2.3:39.4_0: These three people similar to Kāsī are found among the monks.
ai-pp2.3:40.1_0: And who is the person easy to measure?
ai-pp2.3:40.2_0: It’s when a person is restless, insolent, fickle, scurrilous, loose-tongued, unmindful, lacking situational awareness and immersion, with straying mind and undisciplined faculties.
ai-pp2.3:41.1_0: And who is the person hard to measure?
ai-pp2.3:41.2_0: It’s someone who is restless, insolent, fickle, scurrilous, or loose-tongued, but has established mindfulness, situational awareness and immersion, with unified mind and restrained faculties.
ai-pp2.3:42.1_0: And who is the person hard to measure?
ai-pp2.3:42.2_0: It’s someone who realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.3:42.3_0: This is called ‘a person hard to measure’.
ai-pp2.3:43.1_0: Who is the person you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend?
ai-pp2.3:43.2_0: It’s someone who is inferior in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:43.3_0: You shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them to such a person, apart from compassion.
ai-pp2.3:44.1_0: Who is the person you should associate with, accompany, and attend?
ai-pp2.3:44.2_0: It’s someone who is similar in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:44.3_0: you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.
ai-pp2.3:44.5_0: “When our ethical conduct is similar, we can discuss ethical, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.
ai-pp2.3:44.6_0: Since our immersion is similar, we can discuss immersion, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.
ai-pp2.3:44.7_0: Since our wisdom is similar, we can discuss wisdom, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.”
ai-pp2.3:44.8_0: That’s why you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.
ai-pp2.3:45.1_0: Who is the person you should associate with, accompany, and attend with honor and respect?
ai-pp2.3:45.2_0: It’s someone who is superior in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:45.3_0: you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person with honor and respect.
ai-pp2.3:45.5_0: “I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of ethical conduct I have fulfilled, or support with wisdom in every situation the ethical conduct I’ve already fulfilled.
ai-pp2.3:45.6_0: I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion ...
ai-pp2.3:45.7_0: I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom I haven’t yet fulfilled, or support with wisdom in every situation the wisdom I’ve already fulfilled.”
ai-pp2.3:45.8_0: That’s why you should associate with, accompany, and attend this person with honor and respect.
ai-pp2.3:46.1_0: Who is the person you should be disgusted by, and not associate with, accompany, or attend?
ai-pp2.3:46.2_0: It’s when some person is unethical, of bad qualities, filthy, with suspicious behavior, underhand, no true ascetic or spiritual practitioner—though claiming to be one—rotten inside, corrupt, and depraved.
ai-pp2.3:46.3_0: You should be disgusted by such a person, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
ai-pp2.3:46.5_0: Even if you don’t follow the example of such a person, you still get a bad reputation:
ai-pp2.3:46.6_0: “A bad individual has a bad friends, companions, and associates.”
ai-pp2.3:46.7_0: They’re like a snake that’s been living in a pile of dung. Even if it doesn’t bite, it’ll still rub off on you.
ai-pp2.3:46.8_0: In the same way, even if you don’t follow the example of such a person, you still get a bad reputation:
ai-pp2.3:46.9_0: “A bad individual has a bad friends, companions, and associates.”
ai-pp2.3:46.10_0: That’s why you should be disgusted by such a person, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
ai-pp2.3:47.1_0: Who is the person you should regard with equanimity, and not associate with, accompany, or attend?
ai-pp2.3:47.2_0: It may happen that a person is irritable and bad-tempered. They display annoyance, hate, and bitterness.
ai-pp2.3:47.3_0: They’re like a festering sore, which, when you hit it with a stick or a stone, discharges and even when irritable you’re not irritable and bad-tempered. Then some person displaying annoyance, hate, and bitterness due to anger.
ai-pp2.3:47.4_0: They’re like a firebrand of pale-moon ebony, which, when you hit it with a stick or a stone, sizzles and crackles even more.
ai-pp2.3:47.5_0: In the same way, someone is irritable and bad-tempered. When someone is spoken to, they lose their temper ...
ai-pp2.3:47.6_0: They’re like a sewer, which, when you stir it with a stick or a stone, stinks even more.
ai-pp2.3:47.7_0: In the same way, someone is irritable and bad-tempered. When someone is spoken to, they lose their temper ...
ai-pp2.3:47.8_0: You should regard such a person with equanimity, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
ai-pp2.3:47.10_0: “It would be good if I could abuse or insult me, I wouldn’t do me harm.”
ai-pp2.3:47.11_0: That’s why you should regard such a person with equanimity, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
ai-pp2.3:48.1_0: Who is the person you should associate with, accompany, and attend?
ai-pp2.3:48.2_0: It’s someone who is ethical, of good character.
ai-pp2.3:48.3_0: you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.
ai-pp2.3:48.5_0: Even if you don’t follow the example of such a person, you still get a good reputation:
ai-pp2.3:48.6_0: “That individual has good friends, companions, and associates.”
ai-pp2.3:48.7_0: That’s why you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.
ai-pp2.3:49.1_0: And who has fulfilled their ethics, immersion, and wisdom?
ai-pp2.3:49.3_0: These are called the kind of person who has fulfilled ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:50.1_0: And what person has fulfilled ethics, immersion, and wisdom?
ai-pp2.3:50.3_0: This is called a person who has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but has limited wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:51.1_0: And what person has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but has limited wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:51.3_0: This is called a person who has fulfilled ethics and immersion, and wisdom.
ai-pp2.3:52.1_0: Herein, what are the three teachers?
ai-pp2.3:52.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t advocate the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, or feelings.
ai-pp2.3:52.3_0: But take someone who advocates the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, or feelings.
ai-pp2.3:52.4_0: Take the teacher who advocates the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, and feelings.
ai-pp2.3:53.1_0: Now, the teacher should advocate the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, or feelings that are to be directly known and completely understood.
ai-pp2.3:53.2_0: Now, the teacher advocates the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, or feelings that are to be directly known and completely understands the attainment of the formless.
ai-pp2.3:53.3_0: The teacher advocates the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, sights, and feelings.
ai-pp2.3:54.1_0: Herein, what are the three teachers in which he is:
ai-pp2.3:54.2_0: It’s when some teacher describes the self as a teacher who has seen the truth, and who describes the truth as true.
ai-pp2.3:54.3_0: But here, take the Teacher who describes the present life as a teacher who has seen the truth, but not the self. But they’re described in the present life.
ai-pp2.3:54.4_0: But take the case of a teacher who doesn’t describe the self as a genuine fact that they are incapable of truth, or who describe the truth as self.
ai-pp2.3:55.1_0: But the teacher who describes the self as having seen the Truth, wisdom, and preserves the truth, and he describes the self as a teacher who is eternal, regarded as truthful.
ai-pp2.3:55.2_0: In this case the teacher who describes the doctrine, but not the self describes it, thus it is the truth that should be realized.
ai-pp2.3:55.3_0: But the teacher who has seen the truth as self, nor does the senior, but not describe it as a teacher, and who describes the truth as self.
ai-pp2.3:55.4_0: These are the three teachers in the world;
